_sText: Hope u like this claymore I tried to make it look as real as possible so I made it sit on the floor (unlike another claymore I downloaded). It also triggers when props go in front of it so if u want just have fun shooting stuff into the sensors and watch it explode from a safe distance I donâ€™t know but I do know there great fun with groups of people(DONT WALK INFRUNT OF ME WHEN IM HANDILING EXSPLOSIVES !! click.......BOOM!)
